query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `data_integrity_metrics` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `calculatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `metricType` ENUM('orphaned_records', 'duplicate_records', 'missing_dependencies', 'stale_computations', 'invalid_weights', 'broken_references', 'esg_ratings_stale', 'last_cleanup_success', 'last_cleanup_failure', 'recurring_errors') NOT NULL,
  `metricCategory` VARCHAR(100),
  `entityType` VARCHAR(100),
  `metricValue` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `metricValueDecimal` DECIMAL(15, 4),
  `severity` ENUM('info', 'warning', 'critical') DEFAULT 'info' NOT NULL,
  `threshold` INT,
  `affectedRecordIds` JSON,
  `affectedRecordCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `previousValue` INT,
  `changePercent` DECIMAL(5, 2),
  `trendDirection` ENUM('up', 'down', 'stable'),
  `description` TEXT,
  `recommendation` TEXT,
  `metadata` JSON,
  `expiresAt` TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `idx_calculated_at` (`calculatedAt`),
  INDEX `idx_metric_type` (`metricType`),
  INDEX `idx_severity` (`severity`),
  INDEX `idx_category_type` (`metricCategory`, `metricType`),
  INDEX `idx_expires_at` (`expiresAt`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2g8chP3aro94bni.root --database XnmtZZwX6e46H8JVZbq4Ta --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `data_integrity_metrics` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `calculatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `metricType` ENUM('orphaned_records', 'duplicate_records', 'missing_dependencies', 'stale_computations', 'invalid_weights', 'broken_references', 'esg_ratings_stale', 'last_cleanup_success', 'last_cleanup_failure', 'recurring_errors') NOT NULL,
  `metricCategory` VARCHAR(100),
  `entityType` VARCHAR(100),
  `metricValue` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `metricValueDecimal` DECIMAL(15, 4),
  `severity` ENUM('info', 'warning', 'critical') DEFAULT 'info' NOT NULL,
  `threshold` INT,
  `affectedRecordIds` JSON,
  `affectedRecordCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `previousValue` INT,
  `changePercent` DECIMAL(5, 2),
  `trendDirection` ENUM('up', 'down', 'stable'),
  `description` TEXT,
  `recommendation` TEXT,
  `metadata` JSON,
  `expiresAt` TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `idx_calculated_at` (`calculatedAt`),
  INDEX `idx_metric_type` (`metricType`),
  INDEX `idx_severity` (`severity`),
  INDEX `idx_category_type` (`metricCategory`, `metricType`),
  INDEX `idx_expires_at` (`expiresAt`)
);
